name: remimd
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(ccj, c0), co(cfv(cre, c0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wceq(cfv(ccj, c0), co(cfv(cre, c0), cmin, co(ci, cmul, cfv(cim, c0)))), wcel(c0, cc))

comment: Value of the conjugate of a complex number. The value is the real part minus ` _i ` times the imaginary part. Definition 10-3.2 of [Gleason] p. 132. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
